publicationstmt.p: This finding aid is made available for public use following the Universal 1.0 Public Domain Dedication Creative Commons designation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-08-18 12:38:22 -0400.

did.langmaterial: Max Beckmann material in German. M.Q. Beckmann diary in English.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 10 daily diaries of Max Beckmann (1942-1950); one diary of Mathilde Q. Beckmann (1982) with only one entry, on January 1; early 1920s unpublished play script manuscripts by Max Beckmann for "Maxim von Plessant der damenfreund..." and "Ebi" or "Ich will..."

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Max Beckmann papers, 1917-1954, at the Smithsonian Archives of American Art. https://www.aaa.si.edu/collections/max-beckmann-papers-8879/more-information

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Reproductions may be made for research purposes. Copyright remains with the creator and his/her heirs. The responsibility to secure copyright permission rests with the patron.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Max Beckmann Diaries; Box and Folder; Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University Library.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. Contact rbml@columbia.edu for more information.
